itunes:title: Episode 893 - The Giant Killer
title: Episode 893 - The Giant Killer
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Former police officer turned author and documentary filmmaker David Yuzuk is back with more details and an exclusive interview detailing the incredible life of Richard Flaherty -- a decorated Vietnam veteran turned national intelligence operative -- who ...
itunes:summary:
Former police officer turned author and documentary filmmaker David Yuzuk is back with more details and an exclusive interview detailing the incredible life of Richard Flaherty -- a decorated Vietnam veteran turned national intelligence operative -- who at 4 feet 9 inches tall was the shortest man to serve in the military this century. David also tells some of his best cop stories while working in Miami including walking on a female suspect in a very compromising position.
